name: Tap Nations
description:
Tap Nations is a very simple yet deep, casual real-time strategy.

Easy: Tap rapidly on other countries to attack, or on your countries to defend.

...and it includes NUKES & MISSILES now!

Go idle after you use your offensive and defensive power-ups, and let them do the work for you. Just sit back, and watch as you dominate. Or combine everything all together and storm the tap-world!

Upgrade them as the cash piles up, and as your domination expands!

- 200 playable countries. You can't conquer them all. Can you?

- 16 new custom flags to add a bit more style to your conquest!

- 10 new Super Powers including NUKE!, Super Shields, and Ballistic Missiles.

- You earn money with taps, shields, and owned territories over time.

Our future plans (according to your feedback) include:
- Adding short competitive matches versus others.
- Adding historical game modes such as WW2, American Civil War...
- Adding diplomacy; alliances and trade.
- More differences in gameplay between the nations.
- Adding a "play with your friends" mode.

Let's make Tap Nations a global hit together. Thanks a lot for your great reviews, feedback, and support.

iCloud must be logged in, in order to save your purchase data even when you delete & reinstall the game.
